scripts.build: npm run build:typescript && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:typescript: tsc frontend/app.ts --outDir frontend/dist --target ES2020 --module ES2020 --moduleResolution node && tsc frontend/upload.ts --outDir frontend/dist --target ES2020 --module ES2020 --moduleResolution node
scripts.build:frontend: mkdir -p frontend/dist && cp frontend/index.html frontend/dist/ && cp frontend/upload.html frontend/dist/ && cp -r frontend/fonts frontend/dist/ && cp frontend/*.png frontend/dist/ && tsc frontend/app.ts --outDir frontend/dist --target ES2020 --module ES2020 --moduleResolution node && tsc frontend/upload.ts --outDir frontend/dist --target ES2020 --module ES2020 --moduleResolution node
scripts.dev:frontend: npm run build && cd frontend/dist && python3 -m http.server 3000
scripts.dev:full: npm run build && concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.firebase:deploy:hosting: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting
